about.p1: My name is Franco Guti√©rrez. I have been working as a freelance developer for over 3 years, collaborating with companies and clients from around the world.
about.p2: I specialize in developing web, mobile, and desktop applications. I enjoy working with modern technologies and creating solutions that truly help people solve real problems.
about.p3: Some of my most notable projects include developing a medical management platform used in clinics in Argentina, and a desktop stock control app used by small businesses.
about.p4: I have also actively participated in tech communities and programming events, including talks at meetups and regional hackathons. I firmly believe in the power of knowledge sharing to grow as an industry.

hero.title: Hi, I'm Franco
hero.description: +3 years of experience. Software Developer from Argentina. Specialized in building unique applications.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
experience.description: Custom solutions for small businesses and entrepreneurs. Built sales systems, custom web apps, corporate sites, and cross-platform mobile apps. Focused on performance, usability, and scalability.

projects.title: Official Website of Some Social Meeting
projects.description: Portuguese landing page developed with React and Next.js for the company Some Social Meeting. Responsive design, optimized load times, and basic SEO implemented.

projects.title: Sales System with Python and Tkinter
projects.description: Desktop app to manage sales, inventory, and reports for small businesses. Interface built with Tkinter, data persisted with SQLite. Functional project adaptable to various industries.
